name: i18n-l10n-editor
description: This editor will allow you to edit you Localization and Internationalization files easily. Using Microsoft Translation, you can translate to a wide range of languages automatically. Supported formats are i13n, l10n, r13n, arb and json.

i18n-l10n-editor.keyCaseStyle.description:
how to write keys to the files valid methods are [no change, camelCase, lowercase, UPPERCASE].
camelCase requires spaces when typing key.

i18n-l10n-editor.sortKeyTogether.description: Sort files so that key and @key will be kept together.

i18n-l10n-editor.autoTranslateNewLanguag.description: Will auto translate all new key translation when adding a new language.

i18n-l10n-editor.defaultLanguage.description: Used when no default language is specified in translation files otherwise the first file found is used.

i18n-l10n-editor.substitutionText.description: A String to replace text when highlighting text in a Dart editor. To have this work you should place the following in your build methods final l10n = AppLocalizations.of(context); This will allow the editor to place l10n.exampleKey in your files.

i18n-l10n-editor.jsonSpace.description: A String or Number that's used to insert white space into the output JSON.

i18n-l10n-editor.keySeparator.description: String to separate keys, or false if no separator is preferred.

i18n-l10n-editor.lineEnding.description: String used to signify the end of a line.

i18n-l10n-editor.supportedYamlFiles.description: An array of YAML file names that's used to search for configuration settings.

i18n-l10n-editor.supportedFolders.description: An array of folder names that's used to open the extension through the right click (restart required after changing the value).

i18n-l10n-editor.supportedExtensions.description: An array of file extension to check when loading the editor. if no file exists then the first one is used by default (restart required after changing the value).

i18n-l10n-editor.translationService.description: Specified which translation service to use.

i18n-l10n-editor.translationServiceApiKe.description: Api key used by the translation service, leave this blank if you wish to switch between Translation Services. Copy this from the Key Generation page.

i18n-l10n-editor.translationServiceApiSe.description: Api secret used by the translation service, leave this blank if you wish to switch between Translation Services. Copy this from the Key Generation page.

i18n-l10n-editor.translationServiceApiRe.description: Api region used by the translation service, leave this blank if you wish to switch between Translation Services. Copy this from the Key Generation page.

i18n-l10n-editor.translationServiceAmazo.description: Settings for the Amazon Translate APIs ["apiKey","apiSecret","apiRegion"]. Copy this from the Key Generation page.

i18n-l10n-editor.translationServiceGoogl.description: Settings for the Google Translate APIs ["apiKey","apiSecret","apiRegion"]. Copy this from the Key Generation page.

i18n-l10n-editor.translationServiceMicro.description: Settings for the Microsoft Translate APIs ["apiKey","apiSecret (blank)","apiRegion"]. Copy this from the Key Generation page.

i18n-l10n-editor.workspaceFolders.description: An array of objects to specify which folders are used to manage your translations.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
